constituent: erupt, mouth, pitchfork, haystack, ten, needle, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, needle3, ten3
koohiiStory1: History of Pompei: An unexpect eruption and from the mouths of the volcano come lava that threatens the farmers collecting haystacks in the fields and the fisherman catching shells on the coast.
koohiiStory2: A bit nasty (but makes the whole thing much easier to remember) is to take the right side and call it a bearded clam. For erupt, you can make your own story about the mouth/opening on the left.
words:
噴出(ふんしゅつ): spewing, gushing, spouting, eruption, effusion
噴火(ふんか): eruption
噴水(ふんすい): water fountain
